1.1.3.commit_description: Some povray fixes pointed out @ https://www.phoronix.com/forums/forum/phoronix/phoronix-test-suite/918309-povray-1-1-2-installation though on GCC 6 it's still not building cleanly for me due to compiler errors.

1.1.2.commit_description: Add tiff external dependency. Needed at least on Fedora.

1.1.0.commit_description: POVRay 3.7 has finally been released with multi-threading support! Update against upstream POVRay 3.7.0 sources obtained from Git then self-hosted.
